name: Forest of Swords
simple_desc: Consumes own HP and deals Wind DMG to one enemy, as well as minor Wind DMG to adjacent targets.
desc:
Consumes HP equal to #1[i]% of Blade's Max HP and deals Wind DMG equal to #2[i]% of his Max HP to one designated enemy. In addition, deals Wind DMG equal to #3[i]% of Blade's Max HP to adjacent targets.
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when using "Forest of Swords."
"Forest of Swords" cannot regenerate Skill Points.
